title: Katalon Runtime Engine overview
description: Katalon Runtime Engine (KRE) is the test execution add-on of Katalon Studio. Katalon Runtime Engine allows you to execute automation tests in CLI mode. It can be used in a variety of scenarios, such as scheduling your tests, integrating with CI/CD system, or bundling your tests to execute in virtual containers like Docker.

next.title: Get started with Katalon Runtime Engine
